name: Cyborg Tower Defense
description: Futuristic 3D Tower Defense Game where evil Cyborgs try to take over the space ship Andromeda deck by deck. Zoom right into the action and glide over the surface to see the spectacular weapons and explosions at your disposal. Kill 'em all!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core cpu 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 240 MB available space
